vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.8;
son of: Becher (H1071);
brother of: Zemirah (H2160), Eliezer (H0461I), Elioenai (H0454I), Omri (H6018H), Jeremoth (H3406H), Abijah (H0029K), Anathoth (H6068H) and Alemeth (H5964H)
§ Joash = "Jehovah hastens"
1) a Benjamite, son of Becher
2) one of the officers in David's court
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Béquer; tribu de Benjamín; (b)   funcionario; en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約阿施 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華催促"
1) 便雅憫人, 比結的兒子 (代上 7:8)
2) 大衛手下的一名官員 (代上 27:28)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约阿施 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华催促"
1) 便雅悯人, 比结的儿子 (代上 7:8)
2) 大卫手下的一名官员 (代上 27:28)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.28
§ Joash = "Jehovah hastens"
1) a Benjamite, son of Becher
2) one of the officers in David's court
